attributes.action: Leglislate that television adverts are transmitted at the same volume level as programmes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a constant annoyance that adverts are broadcast at a volume level way in excess of the programmes they interrupt. I can’t see any technical reason for it, therefore, why? As it is, it’s bad enough having to put up with what seems to be more adverts than programme without having them blaring out!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
